https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6Pe25kFy7C9O0LvFkcnkAGitW1r.jpg Sir Trevor McDonald returns to Indiana State Prison's Death Row five years after his first gruelling visit. Reuniting with the men convicted of heinous crimes and meeting some new ones too, he discovers how the intervening years have impacted them. Death Row 2018 with Trevor McDonald
